panel__config__subheader_line_1.message: Currently http_max_download and ftp_max_download share the same config value. When both parameters are requested to be set at the same time, the requested ftp_max_download rate will overwrite the requested http_max_download rate.

panel__config__subheader_line_2.message: Considering identical rates may be simultaneously used by the other packages other than Download Station, the HTTP and FTP max download rates will not affect tasks whose current status is “downloading”. New rates will only be applied to those newly added/resumed HTTP/FTP tasks.

panel__config__not_admin.message: Only user with admin privileges can change Download Station settings. Please log in with an account with appropriate permissions.

panel__config__bt_max_download__subheade.message: Max BT download speed in KB/s (“0” means unlimited)

panel__config__bt_max_upload__subheader.message: Max BT upload speed in KB/s (“0” means unlimited)

panel__config__emule_max_download__subhe.message: Max eMule download speed in KB/s (“0” means unlimited)

panel__config__emule_max_upload__subhead.message: Max eMule upload speed in KB/s (“0” means unlimited)

panel__config__nzb_max_download__subhead.message: Max NZB download speed in KB/s (“0” means unlimited)

panel__config__http_max_download__subhea.message: Max HTTP download speed in KB/s (“0” means unlimited)

panel__config__ftp_max_download__subhead.message: Max FTP download speed in KB/s (“0” means unlimited)

panel__config__unzip_service_enabled__su.message: If Auto unzip service is enabled for users except admin or administrators group

panel__config__default_destination__subh.message: Default destination for new download tasks.

panel__config__emule_default_destination.message: Default destination for new eMule download tasks.
